mapper.sql: id, route_id, supplier_type, sub_type, supplier_id, supplier_name, create_time
mapper.insert: insert into group_route_supplier (id, route_id, supplier_type, sub_type, supplier_id, supplier_name, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{routeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supplierType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{subType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{supplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT})

id,
route_id,
supplier_type,

supplier_name,

mapper.update:
update group_route_supplier
route_id = #{routeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
supplier_type = #{supplierType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sub_type = #{subType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
supplier_name = #{supplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update group_route_supplier set route_id = #{routeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, supplier_type = #{supplierType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sub_type = #{subType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, supplier_name = #{supplierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from group_route_supplier where route_id = #{routeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND supplier_type IN (2,3,5)

select b.supplier_id,b.supplier_name from group_route a,group_route_supplier b where a.id=b.route_id and a.group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and b.supplier_type=#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} group by b.supplier_name

select
from group_route_supplier where route_id in (select id from group_route where group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

select
from group_route_supplier where route_id in (select id from group_route where order_id=#{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
